roleset.name: to count or estimate incorrectly

example.name: miscalculate-v: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Bush and his advisers miscalculated the politics of the abortion issue , failing to grasp how dramatically the abortion - rights movement would be aroused following last summer 's Supreme Court decision to restrict those rights in the Webster case .

propbank.arg: the politics of the abortion issue
failing to grasp how dramatically the abortion - rights movement would be aroused following last summer 's Supreme Court decision to restrict those rights in the Webster case

example.name: miscalculate-v: with Arg2
example.text: When the market opened at 9:30 a.m. EST , a reporter for the Reuters newswire miscalculated the industrial average 's drop as a 4 % decline when it really was down 0.7 % .

propbank.arg: When the market opened at 9:30 a.m. EST
a reporter for the Reuters newswire

example.name: miscalculation-n
example.text: The military authorities ' miscalculation of the situation led to war .

roleset.note: MISCALCULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'miscalculate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from miscalculate.01-v predicate notes)
MISCALCULATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Comparison to miscalculate.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from miscalculation.01-n)
